snippet: The judge in the case agreed to give defense lawyers for James E. Holmes, who is accused of killing 12 people, more time to enter a plea.
abstract: Judge William B Sylvester of Colorado's Arapahoe County District Court, hearing case against accused shooter James E Holmes, agrees to postpone arraignment for two months to give his defense lawyers more time to prepare and enter a plea; decision angers families of victims.

byline.original: By DAN FROSCH and EMMA G. FITZSIMMONS
byline.contributor: Dan Frosch reported from Centennial, and Emma G. Fitzsimmons from New York.

lead_paragraph: The judge in the case agreed to give defense lawyers for James E. Holmes, who is accused of killing 12 people, more time to enter a plea.

headline.main: Arraignment in Colorado Theater Shooting Postponed
headline.print_headline: Arraignment in Colorado Theater Shooting Postponed
